channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023070923
item.description:
Report X-2023070923

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: NEWBURGH
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE BELT LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION NOTICED THAT THE BOTTLE WAS PUNCTURED WHICH CAUSED LEAKAGE. DescribePack: THE LOCATION OF THE LEAKAGE WAS BY THE TOP OF THE BOTTLE . DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT INSIDE OF A PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG

item.title: Report X-2023070881
item.description:
Report X-2023070881

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-09
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. 2 containers of mile hi had loose cap and leaked. the caps were tightened. Box was place in a bin. DescribePack: 2 containers of mile- hi gasoline improver had loose caps and leaked about 2 tablespoons of liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The caps were tightened, and the package was placed into a bin.

item.title: Report X-2023070804
item.description:
Report X-2023070804

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-07T15:11:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-06
  • City: WEST HENRIETTA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Management informed us that there was a leaking Hazmat in a bin. I located the bin and moved it to the Hazmat cage to be processed. DescribePack: Corrosive acid leaked onto the package causing the packaging to disintegrate on the side. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I placed absorbent pads over the initial spill while the sort was still going. Then cleaned the spill and used gloves to contain the Hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2023070773
item.description:
Report X-2023070773

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-05
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023070773 SequenceEvent: SEQUENCE OF EVENTS IS UNKNOWN. DescribePack: THIS PKG CONTAINS FOUR PLASTIC CONTAINERS OF DISINFECTANT SOLUTION. UNFORTUNATELY, THIS PACKAGE BECAME DAMAGED WHILE IN TRANSIT. ALL OF THE CONTAINERS HAVE NO SEALS AND LOOSE CAPS. AS A RESULT, SOME OF THE LIQUID HAS LEAKED OUT OF THE CONTAINERS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PKG WAS PLACED IN A LARGE PLASTIC BAG AND PLACED IN OUR DAMAGED HAZMAT AREA. 2. X-2023070774 SequenceEvent: SEQUENCE OF EVENTS IS UNKNOWN. DescribePack: THIS PKG CONTAINS FOUR PLASTIC CONTAINERS OF DISINFECTANT SOLUTION. UNFORTUNATELY, THIS PACKAGE BECAME DAMAGED WHILE IN TRANSIT. ALL OF THE CONTAINERS HAVE NO SEALS AND LOOSE CAPS. AS A RESULT, SOME OF THE LIQUID HAS LEAKED OUT OF THE CONTAINERS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PKG WAS PLACED IN A LARGE PLASTIC BAG AND PLACED IN OUR DAMAGED HAZMAT AREA.

item.title: Report X-2023070762
item.description:
Report X-2023070762

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: RENSSELAER
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A package handler discovered this package coming down the NC belt and was damp on the bottom, he pulled it off to the side and let a member of management know which placed it inside a yellow hazmat drum and placed into the hazmat cage under ventilation. DescribePack: All four of their caps were loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was placed in a yellow hazmat drum and placed in the damage hazmat cage under the ventilation.

item.description:
Report E-2023070673

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into the one case of cadox (un3105) damaging two of the inner poly one gallon bottle, releasing two gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023070525
item.description:
Report E-2023070525

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: NEWBURGH
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer forklift operator punctured a box with the forkblade from his forklift consequently puncturing an inner container contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured container.
